verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and hath cast <S%H5394>out<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> thou;

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> them, and utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H2763><s%> them; thou shalt <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> show <S%H2603>mercy<s%> unto them:

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with them; thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> unto his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>son.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they will turn <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H4480>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> me, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> so will the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> thee <S%H4118>suddenly.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>deal<s%> with them; ye shall <S%H5422>destroy<s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and break <S%H7665>down<s%> their <S%H4676>images,<s%> and cut <S%H1438>down<s%> their <S%H842>groves,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their graven <S%H6456>images<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee to <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5459>special<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto himself, above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did <S%H3808>not<s%> set his <S%H2836>love<s%> upon you, nor <S%H977>choose<s%> you, because ye were more in <S%H4480>number<s%> <S%H7230><s%> than <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> were the <S%H4592>fewest<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4480>loved<s%> <S%H160><s%> you, and because he would <S%H4480>keep<s%> <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondmen,<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> which <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations;<s%>

And <S%H7999>repayeth<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H6440>face,<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> them: he will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H309>slack<s%> to him that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> him, he will <S%H7999>repay<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Thou shalt therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

Wherefore it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H6118>if<s%> ye <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> unto <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy fathers: <S%H1><s%>

And he will <S%H157>love<s%> thee, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee: he will also <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>womb,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>land,<s%> thy <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and thy <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and thine <S%H3323>oil,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H504>kine,<s%> and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of thy <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee.

Thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> there shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6135>male<s%> or female <S%H6135>barren<s%> among you, or among your <S%H929>cattle.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will take <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> and will <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3605>none<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest,<s%> upon thee; but will <S%H5414>lay<s%> them upon <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H130>hate<s%> thee.

And thou shalt <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee; thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall have no <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H430>gods;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> will be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> unto thee.

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I; <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> I <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them?

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them: but shalt well <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>temptations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and the <S%H226>signs,<s%> and the <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and the stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>out:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> among them, <S%H5704>until<s%> they that are <S%H7604>left,<s%> and hide <S%H5641>themselves<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, be <S%H6>destroyed.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H6206>frightened<s%> <S%H4480>at<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will put <S%H5394>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee by <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little:<s%> thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3615>consume<s%> them at <S%H4118>once,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>unto<s%> thee, and shall <S%H1949>destroy<s%> them with a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H4103>destruction,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, <S%H5704>until<s%> thou have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them.

The graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall ye <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2530>desire<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%> that is <S%H5921>on<s%> them, nor <S%H3947>take<s%> it unto thee, <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou be <S%H3369>snared<s%> therein: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> lest thou <S%H1961>be<s%> a cursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> like <S%H3644>it:<s%> but thou shalt utterly <S%H8262>detest<s%> <S%H8262><s%> it, and thou shalt utterly <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H8581><s%> it; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a cursed <S%H2764>thing.<s%>
